ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let list=java.getElement('@@id.catalog@ul@li@a');
let result=[];
let stat=java.getElement('@@id.catalog.0@ul.0@li.0@data-num').text();
if(stat=="1"){
	result=list;}
	else{
		for(let i=list.length-1;i>=0;i--){
			result[result.length]=list[i];}}
	result
	</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
 var arr=title;
 var srt=title.replace(/ /g,"");
 var sft=title.replace(/ç¬¬.*?ç« ./g,"ç¬¬.*?");
 var sfc=sft.replace(/$/g,".*?é¡µ");
 var sfn=sft.replace(/$/g,".*?ç»§ç»­é˜…è¯»ã€‚");
 var srf=title.replace(/ /g,"ã€€");
 var fdr=title.replace(/[0-9]+[\s|\u3000]/g,"");
 var dff=src.replace(new RegExp(arr,"g"),"");
 var dfc=dff.replace(new RegExp("\n.{1,7}"+fdr,"g"),"");
 result=dfc.replace(new RegExp(srf,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(srt,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(sfn,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(sfc,"g"),"");
</js>
